titleStmt.title: A quest of enquirie, by women to know, whether the tripe-wife were trimmed by Doll yea or no Gathered by Oliuer Oat-meale.
titleStmt.author: Oat-meale, Oliver.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T.G. and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
